Achievements.Name: Baptism of Fire
Achievements.Description: Successfully complete the tutorial

Achievements.Name: Aspiring Champion of Chaos
Achievements.Description: Successfully complete the first chapter of the Chaos campaign

Achievements.Name: Captain of the Empire
Achievements.Description: Successfully complete the first chapter of the Empire campaign

Achievements.Name: Greenskin Boss
Achievements.Description: Successfully complete the first chapter of the Orc campaign

Achievements.Name: Exalted Champion of Chaos
Achievements.Description: Successfully complete the second chapter of the Chaos campaign

Achievements.Name: General of the Empire
Achievements.Description: Successfully complete the second chapter of the Empire campaign

Achievements.Name: Greenskin Big Boss
Achievements.Description: Successfully complete the second chapter of the Orc campaign

Achievements.Name: Elector Count
Achievements.Description: Complete the Empire campaign

Achievements.Name: Lord of Chaos
Achievements.Description: Complete the Chaos campaign

Achievements.Name: Greenskin Warboss
Achievements.Description: Complete the Orc campaign

Achievements.Name: Focus of the Gods
Achievements.Description: Complete all optional missions in all campaigns

Achievements.Name: Tender Master
Achievements.Description: Fully heal/reinforce at least 1 squad in a refill camp

Achievements.Name: Besieger
Achievements.Description: Kill at least 1 enemy artillery unit based on a tower, during a siege

Achievements.Name: Swordmaster
Achievements.Description: Win any duel in the campaigns

Achievements.Name: Exterminator
Achievements.Description: Kill every single enemy model in a campaign map

Achievements.Name: Path to Glory
Achievements.Description: Finish any campaign with all heroes at lvl 40

Achievements.Name: Wall-crawler
Achievements.Description: Win a siege without siege weapons (by using only ladders and powder kegs)

Achievements.Name: Logistician
Achievements.Description: Win a normal multiplayer battle while spending only 75% of your available money

Achievements.Name: Versatile Commander
Achievements.Description: Win at least one multiplayer battle with each race

Achievements.Name: Foe-Bane
Achievements.Description: Win at least one multiplayer battle against each race

Achievements.Name: Honoured Ally
Achievements.Description: Be on the winning side in a 2v2 battle

Achievements.Name: Duelist
Achievements.Description: Win a duel in a multiplayer battle

Achievements.Name: Tribute to the Staff
Achievements.Description: Watch the complete credits video

Achievements.Name: Master Tactician
Achievements.Description: Win 3 multiplayer battles in a row

Achievements.Name: Master Strategist
Achievements.Description: Win 5 multiplayer battles in a row

Achievements.Name: Master Architect of War
Achievements.Description: Win 10 multiplayer battles in a row

Achievements.Name: Dog of War
Achievements.Description: Win a multiplayer battle with only mercenary units

Achievements.Name: Master of the Baggage Train
Achievements.Description: Refill every squad in your army during any campaign

Achievements.Name: Drillmaster
Achievements.Description: Purchase any upgrade for a regiment in any campaign

Achievements.Name: Rising Force
Achievements.Description: One of the campaign Heroes reaches lvl15

Achievements.Name: Paymaster
Achievements.Description: Sell a non-expendable artefact to the alchemist

Achievements.Name: Master of the Winds of Magic
Achievements.Description: Kill at least 3 enemy models with a single hero spell

Achievements.Name: Cavalry Leader
Achievements.Description: Enter a battle with a mounted hero in Campaign

Achievements.Name: Warlord of Chaos Unified
Achievements.Description: Complete Chaos campaign twice. Once with Khorne and once with Nurgle

Achievements.Name: Veteran of Battle
Achievements.Description: Win 10 multiplayer battles in staged arena mode

Achievements.Name: Army Battle Standard Bearer
Achievements.Description: Win 10 multiplayer battles in the escort the flag mode

Achievements.Name: Skull-Taker
Achievements.Description: Kill 100 heroes in multiplayer games

Achievements.Name: Longbeard
Achievements.Description: Play 100 multiplayer games

Achievements.Name: Grand Despoiler
Achievements.Description: Win 10 Siege multiplayer battles

Achievements.Name: Hammer of the Gods
Achievements.Description: Complete all campaigns on hard difficulty

Achievements.Name: Ways to Command
Achievements.Description: Complete an entire campaign with the advanced controller scheme

Achievements.Name: Heroism
Achievements.Description: Win a multiplayer battle with only Heroes
